item.title: Prometheus
item.description: Introduction to PromQL not an SQL-like language PromQL is powerful but most of the time your needs will be simple Aggregation Basics Gauge snapshot of state we usually agregate it with sum, avg, min or max Total FS size on each machine (node_filesystem_size_bytes metric comes from Node exporter): sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes) without(device, fstype, mountpoint) sum up everything with the same labels ingnore those three Counter tracks the number or size of events (total since start) use rate function as counters are always increasing How many samples Prometheus is ingesting per-second averaged over one minute:
